answers.answer: I'm overweight too, and I have gestational diabetes and I try so hard not to eat junk food and try to eat healthy but is not easy :(((
how far along where youwhen you had your miss carriage
I'm six weeks this is my first pregnancy, what can i do to have a good healthy pregnancy?

I feel you on this one....I'm on my second pregnancy, with my first pregnancy I was 16 years old so I obviously don't remember much but I know for a fact I didn't eat healthy at all, I ended gaining 46 pounds with total pregnancy, With this second pregnancy I'm definitely taking care of what goes in my mouth, I do eat junk food once in a while but very moderate. ....your friend might of us a healthy baby but just eating junk food at the end of the day is not going to do any good for her body , us woman want to be a hot sexy momma not feel all depressed and sloppy because we ate pure junk food during our pregnancy.  .....Think about ;-)

I'm sorry for your loss girly :( but congrats on your rainbow baby! I deff know the feeling of wanting to eat healthier though, I was 18 with my first and didn't exactly eat the greatest, she still came out healthy and happy but I gained A LOT. And have been doing good so far through this pregnancy 25 weeks now.I know you're concerned about doing everything right but just remember not to stress :) I'm sure you're doing everything great! Good luck as well girly.

question: I am 5 weeks pregnant. This will be my second pregnancy. The first ended in miscarriage. My bestfriend is 39 weeks pregnant with absolutely no problems at all. She's overweight, only eats junk food, drinks soda non stop, and never exercises. Yet her baby is perfectly healthy. I can't help but be jealous. How did she get so lucky? This pregnancy I'm trying to cut out soda completely and try my best to eat fruits and vegetables. It ***** to see how easily my friend has it. I watch her devour Oreos and Pepsi with no concern while I'm scared to death to eat one cookie. I just am so frustrated and jealous.
title: Healthy Eating ( read this one)
